And we are moving again

We are moving back to West Hollywood so Lavinia can walk to work. I will also be brushing up on some calculus courses at SMC so I can finally get the graduate degree in Applied Math that I've had my eye on for so long. We found a really unique space with a nice yard for Mooshoo and we still have a Trader Joe's around the corner. See you later, Hollywood!

By Krister Axel on 03/28 2011 at 20_29 in News
